tasks.task: Planting hardneck garlic in a cover crop-filled field
subtasks: Mowing the intended bed strip
Rototilling and strip tilling the bed area
Broadcasting and spreading cover crop seed (oats, peas, radish) in August
Broadcasting and spreading cover crop seed (oats, peas, radish) in October
Driving the mulch cart over the heavy cover crop in spring
Adjusting the mulch cart for optimal performance on thick cover crop mat
Planting garlic cloves in rows through the mulched cover crop
Applying irrigation and curing the garlic in July

tasks.task: Designing and testing a cart for mulching and planting garlic
subtasks: Reviewing existing commercial mulch carts
Partnering with Purdue University engineering students to design a custom cart
Conducting field trials with the custom mulch cart
Operating a seven-member CSA
Delivering produce to subscribers once a week
Responding to customer requests for more vegetables
Expanding the CSA to more subscribers

tasks.task: Caring for young children on the farm
subtasks: Assisting with the farm work when needed
Overcoming challenges presented by the number of young children

tasks.task: Improving soil fertility through cover cropping
subtasks: Planting cover crops every August and October
Winter-killing the cover crops through natural processes or controlled grazing
Raising hardneck garlic seed on the farm
Selling garlic seed and eating garlic on the farm's website
Managing a small team of farm workers (children and volunteers)
Transitioning from tillage to minimal disturbance practices
Using a shank ripper instead of rototilling
Harvesting garlic scapes and deciding when to harvest bulbs

tasks.task: Handling customer inquiries and orders through social media
subtasks: Managing a Facebook page for customer engagement
Processing pre-orders and selling garlic online
Maintaining a busy schedule balancing farm work, customer service, and family responsibilities
